annotations.description: There wasn't a lot of action on the pitch. We could describe the game as average. You have to say that the visitors have been the better side. The home side were defending patiently to win the ball off the opponent and launch the counter. However, the away side moved the ball around and were waiting for a gap to appear in the home side's defence.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: That's the end of the match.
What a poor attempt! Diego Laxalt (Genoa) drives another shot towards goal this time from further out, but it couldn't have been worse if he had shot blindfolded. The ball goes into the stands.
Hernanes (Juventus) attempts to find his teammate with a pass from outside the box, but the opposition's defence is quick to react and thwarts the attack.

annotations.label: time

Simone Zaza (Juventus) is penalised for a foul. Paolo Valeri had a clear view and blows his whistle.
Flag up against Simone Zaza (Juventus). He had space to move into behind the defence, but he went too soon.

annotations.description: Simone Zaza (Juventus) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Paolo Valeri ignores the protests.

annotations.description: Here is a change. Mario Mandzukic is going off and Massimiliano Allegri gives the last tactical orders to Simone Zaza (Juventus).
Mario Mandzukic (Juventus) unleashes a powerful shot towards goal, but it is bravely blocked by a self sacrificing defender.
Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) receives a precise low pass and attempts to finish. The shot, however, goes well wide of the left post.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Hernanes (Juventus) has come on for Mario Lemina.
Panagiotis Tachtsidis (Genoa) unleashes a first time shot into the stands. Next time he should aim better. A really poor attempt.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Stefano Sturaro (Juventus) launches a cross from the corner, but Eugenio Lamanna is alert to thwart the effort.
Stefano Sturaro (Juventus) sends a pass into the box, but his attempt is thwarted and cleared. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Juventus.
The foul by Issa Cissokho (Genoa) was seen by Paolo Valeri who didn't hesitate to blow the whistle.
Diego Laxalt (Genoa) gets on the end of a pass and takes a shot from the edge of the box, but it's blocked by one of the defending players.

Mario Mandzukic (Juventus) unleashes a promising shot towards the left side of the goal after his wonderful solo run, but Eugenio Lamanna thwarts the effort with a fabulous save. The score remains the same.
Nicolas Burdisso (Genoa) makes an unfair challenge by holding his opponent to prevent him from getting the ball.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Diego Capel makes way for Panagiotis Tachtsidis (Genoa).
Patrice Evra (Juventus) gives away a foul for a clumsy challenge. Referee Paolo Valeri saw the whole situation.

annotations.label: y-card

annotations.description: Paul Pogba (Juventus) fires the penalty inside the left post.
Paul Pogba (Juventus) is going to take the penalty!

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Paolo Valeri couldn't ignore the rough tackle by Diogo Figueiras (Genoa) and blew his whistle. Juventus are awarded a penalty! The opposing players are protesting, but the referee had an easy decision to make.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Roberto Pereyra (Juventus) whips in a cross from the corner, but Eugenio Lamanna is well positioned and punches the ball away.

Mario Mandzukic (Juventus) received a pass inside the box and sent a dangerous shot in on goal, but keep the champagne on ice as one of the defenders stepped in and blocked the effort. It's hard to say whether the keeper would have stopped it. Juventus force a corner. They send men into the box.

annotations.label: substitution

Paul Pogba (Juventus) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge.
Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) makes a yard for himself on the edge of the box and produces a poor effort that sails miles wide of the left post.
The ball is cleared after Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) attempted to dribble past an opposing player.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Paolo Valeri shows a yellow card to Blerim Dzemaili (Genoa) for his blatant foul.
Foul! Giorgio Chiellini (Juventus) is penalised for pulling back his opponent.
Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) whips a promising cross into the box, but the opposition's defence intercepts the ball.

annotations.label: substitution

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Everything is set for the start of the second half.

Well, a decent first half here. It's certainly not boring, but not the best match either. The visiting side is dictating the tempo in this game. The home side is creating their opportunities using lightning fast counter attacks. The tactic of the away side is slow build up play.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for half time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.
Eugenio Lamanna pulls off a great save to deny Roberto Pereyra (Juventus), who makes himself some space inside the box and unleashes a quick shot towards the middle of the goal.
Diego Capel (Genoa) finds himself beyond the last defender, but the game is stopped by the referee after the linesman signals for offside.
Paul Pogba (Juventus) wasted a huge opportunity as he received a fine cross from the free kick and fired a shot in from just outside of the box, but it sailed high over the crossbar.
Stefano Sturaro (Juventus) will take the free kick.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: 2 min. of stoppage time to be played.
Diego Capel (Genoa) trips an opposition player and Paolo Valeri signals a foul. Another situation results in a direct free kick for Juventus.

annotations.label: yr-card
annotations.description: Armando Izzo (Genoa) is awarded a yellow card and sent off by Paolo Valeri because it's his second one today.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Diego Perotti (Genoa) swings in the corner, but fails to find any of his teammates. One of the defenders reacts superbly to get it clear.
Genoa are passing the ball across the pitch and keep possession. However, an opponent intercepts a pass and the situation changes. It will be a corner kick for Genoa.

annotations.label: soccer-ball-own
annotations.description: Eugenio Lamanna (Genoa) scores an own goal! No one would like to be in his position right now.
OFF THE BAR! Paul Pogba (Juventus) latches on to an accurate pass inside the box and fires a bullet of a shot that crashes against the crossbar.
Close! Blerim Dzemaili (Genoa) takes the resulting free kick from a promising positon, but his effort flies inches wide of the right post.
Paolo Valeri blows his whistle after Stefano Sturaro (Juventus) brings one of his opponents down with a strong tackle. Genoa are awarded a free kick from a dangerous position.
Diego Capel (Genoa) surprisingly hits a direct free kick goalwards from long distance, but the effort goes wide of the post.
Referee Paolo Valeri sees the trip by Mario Lemina (Juventus) and doesn't hesitate to blow his whistle.
Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) hasn't suffered any serious injury which would see him leave the pitch. He's back in the game now.

Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) quickly takes the free kick with a short pass.

annotations.label: y-card

Armando Izzo (Genoa) makes a reckless foul in order to win the ball from his opponent. Paolo Valeri has a clear sight of it and blows his whistle. Juventus win a free kick. It's a promising situation for a direct shot.
Paolo Valeri has a clear sight and sees a foul from Paul Pogba (Juventus).
Paul Pogba (Juventus) steps up and sends the mid range free kick miles over the bar. Strong but inaccurate shot.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Patrice Evra (Juventus) has tested the patience of referee Paolo Valeri and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

Juan Cuadrado (Juventus) collects a brilliant pass inside the box and finds himself in a goal scoring opportunity. He takes a shot, but the effort is well blocked by one of the defending players.

Giorgio Chiellini (Juventus) carelessly slides into the feet of his opponent and he'll be lucky to avoid punishment. Paolo Valeri blows for the foul but keeps his cards in his pocket on this occasion.
Great ball in from Diego Perotti. Diego Capel (Genoa) should really have done better with a close range header, but he heads it a whisker over the crossbar.
The Juventus players are exchanging some short passes.
Mario Lemina (Juventus) deprives his opponent of the ball, but the referee blows his whistle for a foul. He's not happy with the decision!
An opponent rises to his feet after being downed by Paul Pogba (Juventus). Paolo Valeri saw the sliding tackle and blows for a foul.
Issa Cissokho (Genoa) extricates himself from the difficult situation with a good pass, comfortably eluding the pressing opponent.
Paul Pogba (Juventus) finds himself in a promising position after receiving an excellent pass into the box, but one of the defenders produces a timely intervention to avert the threat.
Olivier Ntcham (Genoa) escapes without any punishment from the referee after using excessive force to foul his opponent.
Alvaro Morata (Juventus) swings a cross into the box, but it's far too close to Eugenio Lamanna, who smothers the ball.
